statements: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 20, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET price = 15.99, item_name = 'New Item' WHERE location = 'Warehouse B';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10, price = 25.50 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE inventory SET location = 'Warehouse A', quantity = 15 WHERE item_name = 'Chair'
UPDATE medical_equipment SET quantity = 10 WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE supplies SET quantity = 20, supply_name = 'Gloves' WHERE supply_id = 2;
UPDATE medical_equipment SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE supplies SET quantity = 20 WHERE supply_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_email = 'newemail@example.com', contact_phone = '+1234567890' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_email = 'newemail@example.com', name = 'New Supplier Name' WHERE id = 456;
UPDATE medical_equipments SET name='Stethoscope', quantity=10 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE suppliers SET location='New York' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE medical_equipments SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New Location' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE medical_equipment SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE telehealth_consultations SET doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE medical_equipment SET unit_price = 1500.00, item_name = 'MRI Machine' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE supply_orders SET quantity_ordered = 100, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 3;
